item.title: 奥巴马医改大部分注册通道关闭，美国民众面临更高账单或更少医保保障
item.description: 随着联邦政府补贴的奥巴马医改计划开放注册期于周四结束，且国会仍就是否及如何恢复新冠疫情期间的丰厚税收抵免存在分歧，数百万美国人将在2026年面临更高的医疗保健费用。【原文：Millions of Americans are facing higher healthcare costs in 2026 as open enrollment for most federally subsidized Obamacare plans closes on Thursday and Congress remains divided on whether and how it should reinstate generous COVID-era tax credits.】

item.title: 加拿大隐私监管机构扩大对X平台的调查，涉及Grok深度伪造技术
item.description: 加拿大隐私监管机构周四表示，正扩大对X平台的现有调查。此前有报道称，该社交媒体平台的Grok人工智能聊天机器人正在制作未经同意的露骨色情深度伪造内容。【原文：Canada's privacy watchdog said on Thursday it was expanding an existing probe into X following reports that the social media platform's Grok AI chatbot was making non-consensual sexually explicit deepfakes.】

item.title: Verizon向受大规模无线服务中断影响的用户提供20美元信用额度
item.description: 美国无线运营商威瑞森通信公司周四表示，将向受周三10小时服务中断影响的数十万用户提供20美元的信用额度。该公司称此次中断是由软件问题引发的。【原文：Verizon Communications said on Thursday it is offering a $20 credit to hundreds of thousands of customers impacted by its 10-hour outage on Wednesday that the U.S. wireless company said was caused by a software issue.】

item.title: 特拉华州法官拒绝加快处理派拉蒙诉讼案，该案要求披露华纳兄弟合并细节
item.description: 特拉华州一名法官周四驳回了派拉蒙天空舞影业公司要求加快诉讼进程的申请。该诉讼旨在迫使华纳兄弟探索公司披露其如何认定奈飞公司提出的827亿美元收购方案优于自身1087亿美元的敌意收购要约。【原文：A Delaware judge on Thursday rejected Paramount Skydance's bid to expedite its lawsuit demanding more information from Warner Bros Discovery about how that company decided Netflix's proposed $82.7 billion takeover was better than its own $108.7 billion hostile bid.】

item.title: 惠誉称美联储独立性削弱将对美国评级构成"信用负面"影响
item.description: 惠誉首席主权分析师周四表示，美联储独立性的重大削弱将对美国信用评级产生负面影响，而任何可能动摇美元全球头号货币地位的迹象都将成为最关键问题。【原文：A major erosion of the Federal Reserve's independence would be negative for ​the U.S. credit rating, Fitch's top ‌sovereign analyst said on Thursday, with any sign that the dollar's top global currency crown could slip the most critical issue.】

item.title: 通用电气航空任命资深人士穆罕默德·阿里领导扩大的CES部门
item.description: 通用电气航空周四宣布，任命资深高管穆罕默德·阿里领导其扩大的商用发动机与服务（CES）部门，该部门现将同时涵盖技术与运营团队。【原文：GE Aerospace said on Thursday it has appointed veteran executive Mohamed Ali to lead its expanded commercial engines and services (CES) division, which will now also include the technology and operations team.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称美国将于三月初敲定2026年生质燃料配额，取消进口惩罚性关税
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，特朗普政府计划于3月初敲定2026年生质燃料掺混配额，该方案将基本维持其初始提案水平，同时取消对可再生燃料及原料进口实施惩罚性措施的计划。【原文：The administration of President Donald Trump plans to finalize 2026 biofuel blending quotas by early March, keeping them close to its initial proposal while dropping a plan to penalize imports of renewable fuels and feedstocks, according to two sources familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 美国进口价格从9月到11月持续上涨
item.description: 美国劳工部劳工统计局周四表示，9月至11月期间，美国进口价格环比上涨0.4%。【原文：U.S. import prices increased 0.4% over the two months from September to November, the Labor Department's Bureau ​of Labor Statistics said on Thursday.】

item.title: 华尔街银行家们在完成大额交易后，将目光转向繁忙的2026年
item.description: 华尔街的投资银行家们预计今年将持续忙碌，此前他们在2025年通过大型交易和股票市场上市项目获得了意外之财。【原文：Wall Street's investment bankers expect to stay busy this year after reaping a windfall from big-ticket deals ​and stock market listings in 2025.】

item.title: 美联储官员古尔斯比告诉CNBC，降低通胀是美联储的主要任务
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦·古尔斯比周四表示，鉴于就业市场稳定的充分证据，央行应专注于降低通胀。此番言论使今年晚些时候降息的可能性依然存在。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said Thursday that amid ample evidence of stability in the job market the central bank should be focused on getting inflation down, in comments that kept alive the prospect of rate cuts later this year.】

item.title: SiFive将采用英伟达技术实现芯片间高速互联
item.description: SiFive公司周四宣布，将成为首家将英伟达技术整合到RISC-V芯片设计中的制造商。该技术可在芯片间建立高速连接通道。SiFive专注于为复杂芯片的特定模块提供设计蓝图。【原文：SiFive, which makes blueprints for parts of complex chips, said on Thursday it will become the first maker of RISC-V chip designs to integrate Nvidia technology that creates speedy links between chips.】

item.title: 朝圣者公司计划到2030年在墨西哥投资13亿美元
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长马塞洛·埃布拉德周四表示，家禽生产商皮尔格里姆将在未来五年内向该国投资13亿美元。【原文：Mexico's Economy Minister Marcelo Ebrard said on Thursday that poultry producer Pilgrim's will invest $1.3 billion in the country in the next five years.】

item.title: 美银称，资产配置者2026年可能将更多资金投向多策略对冲基金
item.description: 据路透社获得的美银内部报告显示，在多策略基金表现强劲的一年之后，对冲基金投资者计划在2026年向最大规模的资产管理公司配置更多资金。【原文：Following ​a buoyant year for multi-strategy funds, hedge fund investors aim to allocate more capital towards ‌the biggest money managers in 2026, according to an internal report compiled by Bank of America that was seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 德国人工智能初创企业Parloa在最新融资中估值翻三倍，达30亿美元
item.description: 德国初创企业Parloa在后期融资中筹集了3.5亿美元，使这家人工智能驱动的客户服务平台估值在不到一年内翻了三倍，达到30亿美元。【原文：German startup Parloa has raised $350 million in a late-stage round that tripled the valuation of the artificial intelligence-driven customer service platform to $3 billion in less than a year.】

item.title: 美国每周初请失业金人数意外下降，面临季节性调整挑战
item.description: 上周美国初请失业金人数意外下降，但这很可能并不意味着劳动力市场出现实质性转变，该市场仍处于停滞状态。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week, but that likely does not signal a material ​shift in the labor market, which remains in a holding ‌pattern.】

item.title: ClassPass母公司Playlist与EGYM达成合并协议，该交易获得贾里德·库什纳旗下公司支持
item.description: 健身预约应用ClassPass的母公司Playlist周四宣布，将与健身科技公司EGYM合并。该交易包含7.85亿美元的股权融资，由贾里德·库什纳的投资公司Affinity Partners领投。【原文：Gym booking app ClassPass owner Playlist said on Thursday it would merge with fitness-tech firm EGYM in a deal that includes equity funding of $785 million, led by Jared Kushner's investment firm Affinity Partners.】

item.title: MSCI数据显示，私募信贷基金对高级贷款的减记率自2022年以来已翻三倍
item.description: MSCI周四在一份报告中指出，随着利率上升，从这些影子银行实体借款的高风险企业面临压力，私募信贷基金对高级贷款的减记率自2022年以来已翻了三倍。【原文：The rate of senior loan writedowns by private credit funds has tripled since 2022 as higher interest rates have pressured the riskier companies that borrow from these shadow banking entities, MSCI said in a report on Thursday.】

item.title: 与中国有关的黑客利用委内瑞拉主题恶意软件攻击美国实体
item.description: 网络安全研究人员周四表示，在美国推翻委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗的行动后数日，一个与中国有关联的网络间谍组织曾向美国政府及政策相关官员发送以委内瑞拉为主题的钓鱼邮件。【原文：A Chinese-linked cyberespionage group targeted U.S. government and policy-related officials with Venezuela-themed phishing emails in the days after the U.S. operation to topple Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, cybersecurity researchers said Thursday.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利利润激增，得益于丰厚的投资银行佣金
item.description: 摩根士丹利第四季度利润增长，得益于投资银行业务收入激增47%——交易活动大幅增加，债务承销费几乎翻倍，推动其股价在盘前交易中上涨1.6%。【原文：Morgan Stanley's profit rose in the fourth quarter, fueled by a 47% jump in investment banking revenue as dealmaking surged and debt underwriting fees nearly doubled, sending its shares 1.6% higher in ​premarket trading.】

item.title: 高盛集团因交易业务和交易实力增强而利润上升
item.description: 高盛集团第四季度利润实现增长，主要得益于并购业务的推动、动荡市场中交易收入的提升，以及终止与苹果信用卡合作项目所获得的一次性收益。【原文：Goldman Sachs' profit rose in the fourth quarter, fueled by dealmaking, stronger trading revenues in a turbulent market and a one-time gain from exiting its credit card partnership with Apple.】

item.title: 波士顿科学公司以145亿美元收购Penumbra公司
item.description: 波士顿科学公司周四宣布，将以约145亿美元的交易额收购Penumbra公司。【原文：Boston Scientific said on Thursday it will buy Penumbra in a deal valued at about $14.5 billion.】

item.title: 人工智能视频初创公司Higgsfield最新融资后估值达13亿美元
item.description: 人工智能视频生成初创公司Higgsfield向路透社透露，已完成8000万美元新一轮融资，公司估值突破13亿美元。随着市场对这项新技术的需求激增，投资者正争相布局该领域。【原文：AI video generation startup Higgsfield raised $80 million in new funding, valuing the company at over $1.3 billion, it told Reuters, as investors rush to develop the sector amid booming demand for the new technology.】

item.title: 美国议员提出法案，拟建立价值25亿美元的关键矿产储备
item.description: 美国两党议员周四提出一项法案，计划建立价值25亿美元的关键矿产储备，此举旨在稳定市场价格并鼓励国内采矿和精炼业发展。【原文：A bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers on Thursday introduced a bill to create a $2.5 billion stockpile of critical minerals, a move aimed at stabilizing market prices and encouraging domestic mining and refining.】

item.title: 巴西央行因"严重违规"清算REAG
item.description: 巴西央行周四下令清算经纪公司REAG（现称CBSF），该决定载于行长加布里埃尔·加利波利签署的文件中。此举是中型银行Banco Master倒闭引发的最新连锁反应。【原文：Brazil's central bank ordered on Thursday the liquidation of brokerage REAG, currently known as CBSF, according to a document signed by Governor Gabriel Galipolo, in the latest fallout from the collapse of mid-sized lender Banco Master.】

item.title: 印度警告苹果公司，在该公司拖延时间后，将推进反垄断诉讼
item.description: 印度已向苹果公司发出最终警告，称将对这家美国科技巨头启动反垄断调查。一份机密文件显示，苹果公司拖延回应调查官员长达一年多，并阻碍了调查进程。【原文：India has issued a final warning to Apple that it will proceed in an antitrust case against the U.S. tech giant as the company has delayed responses to officials for over a year and undermined the investigation, a confidential order shows.】

item.title: 令人眼花缭乱的旋转
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 澳大利亚社交媒体禁令首月封禁470万青少年账户
item.description: 澳大利亚互联网监管机构表示，在该国全球首创的16岁以下用户禁令生效仅一个月后，社交媒体公司已集体注销了近500万个澳大利亚青少年账户，这表明该措施产生了迅速而广泛的影响。【原文：Social media companies have collectively deactivated nearly five million accounts belonging to Australian teenagers just a month after a world-first ban on under‑16s took effect, the country's internet regulator said, a sign the measure has had a swift and sweeping impact.】

item.title: Spotify将在部分市场将月度订阅价格上调至12.99美元
item.description: Spotify周四宣布，将把美国、爱沙尼亚和拉脱维亚市场的现有用户每月高级订阅服务价格上调1美元，至12.99美元。【原文：Spotify said ‌on Thursday it would raise the price of its ‌monthly premium subscription service ​by $1 to $12.99 for existing subscribers in ‍the United States, Estonia and Latvia markets.】

item.title: 美联储主席调查引发美国债券投资者关注收益率上升，威胁住房可负担性
item.description: 美国债券投资者正为长期收益率上升做好准备，因针对美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的刑事调查加剧了通胀上升预期，此举可能最终加剧民众对购房负担能力的担忧。【原文：U.S. bond investors are bracing for higher long-term yields as a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has fueled expectations of elevated inflation, a move that could end up amplifying affordability concerns.】

item.title: 贝莱德资产规模在第四季度市场反弹中创下14万亿美元纪录
item.description: 贝莱德周四公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，市场反弹推动其手续费收入增长，管理资产规模攀升至创纪录的14.04万亿美元。【原文：BlackRock beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday as a rally in markets lifted fee income and pushed its assets under management to a record $14.04 trillion.】
